name: Stellar Chimes
description: A set of crystal wind chimes infused with lunar magic. Each gentle breeze carries a subtle melody reminiscent of the cosmic harmonies that govern the tides.

name: Glowing Starstones
description: A scattering of star-shaped crystals embedded in the pool's surface, each one reflecting hues of the moon and its influence on the lunar cycle. They hum with a soft energy reminiscent of the celestial ballet that unfolds above.
